briefTitle: Ultrasound Tomography Using SoftVue in Diagnosing Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Clinical Data Collection for Initial Evaluation of SoftVue: a Novel Ultrasound Breast Scanner
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Evaluation the SoftVue system with respect to spatial resolution, contrast, sound speed resolution, and attenuation resolution
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Scheduled for mammogram, breast ultrasound and/or breast MRI
* Breast size less than 22 cm diameter (ring diameter is 22cm)
* Able to read or understand and provide informed consent
* Weight \< 350lbs (patient bed max weight)
* Non-pregnant and non-lactating
* No open breast or chest wounds
* No active skin infection
* No serious medical or psychiatric illnesses that would prevent informed consent
